user_query: Please give me the funding rate history for the BTCUSDT symbol from January 1, 2022, to January 10, 2022. Additionally, I'm interested in the announcement made by Bybit in the last 30 days.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the funding rate history for the BTCUSDT symbol from January 1, 2022, to January 10, 2022.
Query the latest announcements made by Bybit in the last 30 days.
